control_param.name: model_mode
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate the simulation mode (PRMS=PRMS; FROST=growing season for each HRU; WRITE_CLIMATE=write CBH files of minimum and maximum air temperature (variables tminf and tmaxf-Fahrenheit); precipitation (variable hru_ppt-inches); solar radiation (variable swrad-Langleys); potential ET (variable potet-inches); and/or transpiration flag (variable transp_on-none); POTET=simulate to potential ET; TRANSPIRE=simulate to transpiration period; DOCUMENTATION=write files of all declared parameters and variables in the executable)

control_param.name: modflow_name
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: precip_module
control_param.desc: Module name for precipitation-distribution method (climate_hru, ide_dist, precip_1sta, precip_dist2, precip_laps, or xyz_dist)

control_param.name: temp_module
control_param.desc: Module name for temperature-distribution method (climate_hru, temp_1sta, temp_dist2, temp_laps, ide_dist, or xyz_dist)

control_param.name: et_module
control_param.desc: Module name for potential evapotranspiration method (climate_hru, potet_jh, potet_hamon, potet_hs, potet_pt, potet_pm, potet_pm_sta, or potet_pan

control_param.name: srunoff_module
control_param.desc: Module name for surface-runoff/infiltration computation method (srunoff_carea or srunoff_smidx)

control_param.name: solrad_module
control_param.desc: Module name for solar-radiation-distribution method (ccsolrad or ddsolrad)

control_param.name: soilzone_module
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: capillary_module
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: strmflow_module
control_param.desc: Module name for streamflow routing simulation method (strmflow, muskingum, strmflow_in_out, or muskingum_lake)

control_param.name: transp_module
control_param.desc: Module name for transpiration simulation method (climate_hru, transp_frost, or transp_tindex)

control_param.name: gsflow_output_file
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: gsflow_csv_file
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: creator_email
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: rpt_days
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: gsf_rpt
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: print_debug
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate type of debug output (-2=minimal output to screen and no model_output_file; -1=minimize screen output; 0=none; 1=water balances; 2=basin module; 4=basin_sum module; 5=soltab module; 7=soilzone module; 9=snowcomp module; 13=cascade module; 14=subbasin module)

control_param.name: cascade_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: cascadegw_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: subbasin_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: gwr_swale_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: frozen_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: dprst_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: parameter_check_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if selected parameter values validations checks are treated as warning or errors (0=no; 1=yes; 2=check parameters then stop)

control_param.name: cbh_check_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: cbh_binary_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether to input CBH files in a binary format using the samer order of values as the text file version (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: dyn_imperv_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of impervious values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s) (0=no; 1=file imperv_frac_dynamic; 2=file imperv_stor_dynamic; 3=both)

control_param.name: dyn_intcp_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of plant canopy interception values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s) (0=no; 1=file wrain_intcp_dynamic; 2=file srain_intcp_dynamic; 4=file snow_intcp_dynamic; additive combinations)

control_param.name: dyn_covden_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of plant-canopy density values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s) (0=no; 1=file covden_sum_dynamic; 2=file covden_win_dynamic; 3=both)

control_param.name: dyn_sro2dprst_perv_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of fraction of surface runoff from the pervious portion of an HRU are input in Dynamic Parameter File sro2dprst_perv_dyn (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: dyn_sro2dprst_imperv_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of fraction of surface runoff from the impervious portion of an HRU are input in Dynamic Parameter File sro2dprst_imperv_dynamic (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: dyn_covtype_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of plant-canopy type values are input in Dynamic Parameter File covtype_dynamic (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: dyn_transp_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of transpiration month values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s) (0=no; 1=file transpbeg_dynamic; 2=file transpend_dynamic only, 3=both)

control_param.name: dyn_transp_on_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: dyn_fallfrost_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of transpiration start Julian day values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s) (0=no; 1 =file fallfrost_dynamic)

control_param.name: dyn_springfrost_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of transpiration start Julian day values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s) (0=no; 1=file springfrost_dynamic)

control_param.name: dyn_potet_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of potential ET coefficient values are input in Dynamic Parameter File potetcoef_dynamic to update coefficients for the specified month for the selected potential ET module specified by control parameter et_module (0=no; 1=parameter jh_coef, pt_alpha, hs_krs, hamon_coef, epan_coef, potet_cbh_adj, and pm_n_coef used in potet_jh, potet_pt, potet_hs, potet_hamon, potet_pan, climate_hru, and potet_pm modules, respectively; 2=parameter jh_coef_hru, pm_d_coef used in potet_jh and potet_pm modules, respectively)

control_param.name: dyn_soil_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of soil-water capacity values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s) (0=no; 1=file soilmoist_dynamic only, 2=file soilrechr_dynamic only; 3=both)

control_param.name: dyn_radtrncf_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of solar radiation values are input in Dynamic Parameter File radtrncf_dynamic (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: dyn_snareathresh_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: dyn_sro_to_dprst_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: dyn_dprst_flag
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate if a time series of surface-depression values are input in a Dynamic Parameter File(s) (0=no; 1=file dprst_frac_dynamic; 2=file dprst_depth_dynamic; 3=both)

control_param.name: stream_temp_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: stream_temp_shade_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: segment_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use stream segment transfer flow rates from the segment_transfer_file (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: gwr_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use groundwater transfer flow rates from the gwr_transfer_file (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: external_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use external transfer flow rates from the external_transfer_file (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: consumed_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: lake_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use lake HRU transfer flow rates from the lake_transfer_file (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: dprst_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: Flag to indicate to use time series of surface-depression transfer flow rates from the dprst_transfer_file (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: soilzone_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: canopy_transferON_OFF
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: seg2hru_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: glacier_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: mbInit_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: musroute_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: orad_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: snow_cbh_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: gwflow_cbh_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: humidity_cbh_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: windspeed_cbh_flag
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: segmentOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: ignore_data_file_end
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: executable_desc
control_param.desc: Descriptive text to identify the PRMS executable

control_param.name: executable_model
control_param.desc: Pathname (full or relative) of the PRMS executable

control_param.name: data_file
control_param.desc: Pathname(s) for measured input Data File(s), typically a single Data File is specified

control_param.name: param_file
control_param.desc: Pathname(s) for Parameter File(s)

control_param.name: var_save_file
control_param.desc: Pathname for the Initial Conditions File to be generated at end of simulation

control_param.name: var_init_file
control_param.desc: Pathname for Initial Conditions input file

control_param.name: stat_var_file
control_param.desc: Pathname for Statistics Variables File

control_param.name: ani_output_file
control_param.desc: Root pathname for Animation Files(s) to which a filename suffix based on dimension name associated with selected variables is appended

control_param.name: model_output_file
control_param.desc: Pathname for Water-Budget File for results module basin_sum

control_param.name: stats_output_file
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: tmax_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed maximum air temperature input data for each HRU to specify variable tmaxf-degrees Fahrenheit

control_param.name: tmin_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed minimum air temperature input data for each HRU to specify variable tminf-degrees Fahrenheit

control_param.name: precip_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed precipitation input data for each HRU to specify variable precip-inches

control_param.name: swrad_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed solar-radiation input data for each HRU to specify variable swrad-Langleys

control_param.name: potet_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed potential-ET input data for each HRU to specify variable potet-inches

control_param.name: transp_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed transpiration on or off flag for each HRU file to specify variable transp_on-none

control_param.name: windspeed_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed wind speed input data for each HRU to specify variable windspeed_hru-meters/second

control_param.name: humidity_day
control_param.desc: Pathname of the CBH file of pre-processed humidity input data for each HRU to specify variable humidity_hru-percentage

control_param.name: pkwater_equiv_day
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: pk_depth_day
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: snow_evap_day
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: snowcov_area_day
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: snowmelt_day
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: gwres_flow_day
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: dprst_area_dynamic
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: dprst_depth_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values used to set values of dprst_depth_avg

control_param.name: dprst_frac_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values used to set values of dprst_frac

control_param.name: snow_intcp_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter snow_intcp

control_param.name: srain_intcp_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter srain_intcp

control_param.name: wrain_intcp_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter wrain_intcp

control_param.name: imperv_frac_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter hru_percent_imperv

control_param.name: imperv_stor_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter imperv_stor_max

control_param.name: covtype_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values used to set values of cov_type for each HRU

control_param.name: covden_sum_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for summer plant-cover density used to set values of covden_sum for each HRU

control_param.name: covden_win_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for winter plant-cover density used to set values of covden_win for each HRU

control_param.name: jhcoef_dynamic
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: potet_coef_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed potential evapotranspiration coefficient values where the parameter is dependent on the value of et_module

control_param.name: transpbeg_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter transp_beg

control_param.name: transpend_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter transp_end

control_param.name: fallfrost_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter fall_frost

control_param.name: springfrost_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter spring_frost

control_param.name: soilrechr_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter soil_rechr_max_frac

control_param.name: soilmoist_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter soil_moist_max

control_param.name: radtrncf_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter rad_trncf

control_param.name: sro2dprst_perv_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter sro_to_dprst_perv

control_param.name: sro2dprst_imperv_dynamic
control_param.desc: Pathname of the time series of pre-processed values for dynamic parameter sro_to_dprst_imperv

control_param.name: transp_on_dynamic
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: csv_output_file
control_param.desc: Pathname of CSV output file

control_param.name: nhruOutBaseFileName
control_param.desc: String to define the prefix for each nhru summary output file.

control_param.name: nsubOutBaseFileName
control_param.desc: String to define the prefix for each nsub summary output file.

control_param.name: basinOutBaseFileName
control_param.desc: String to define the prefix for each basin summary output file.

control_param.name: nsegmentOutBaseFileName
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: start_time
control_param.desc: Simulation start date and time specified in order in the control item as: year, month, day, hour, minute, second

control_param.name: end_time
control_param.desc: Simulation end date and time specified in order in the control item as: year, month, day, hour, minute, second

control_param.name: modflow_time_zero
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: init_vars_from_file
control_param.desc: Flag to specify whether or not the Initial Conditions File is specified as an input file (0=no; 1=yes; 2=yes and use parameter values in Parameter File instead of values in Initial Conditions File)

control_param.name: save_vars_to_file
control_param.desc: Flag to determine if an Initial Conditions File will be generated at the end of simulation (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: initial_deltat
control_param.desc: Initial time step for the simulation

control_param.name: statsON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not the Statistics Variables File is generated (0=no; 1=statvar text format; 2=CSV format)

control_param.name: nstatVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in Statistics Variables File and names specified in statVar_names

control_param.name: aniOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not Animation File(s) are generated (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: aniOutVar_names
control_param.desc: Names of animation output variables

control_param.name: naniOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of output variables specified in the aniOutVar_names list

control_param.name: mapOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not mapped output file(s) by a specified number of columns (parameter ncol) of daily, monthly, yearly, or total simulation results is generated (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: mapOutVar_names
control_param.desc: Names of mapped output variables to include in mapped output file(s)

control_param.name: nmapOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in mapped output file(s)

control_param.name: nhruOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not nhru summary output files are generated (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: nhruOutVar_names
control_param.desc: Names of hru summary variables to include in nhru summary output file(s)

control_param.name: nhruOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in nhru summary output file(s)

control_param.name: nhruOut_freq
control_param.desc: Output frequency and type (1=daily; 2=monthly; 3=both; 4=mean monthly; 5=mean yearly; 6=yearly)

control_param.name: prms_warmup
control_param.desc: Number of years to run simulation before recording results

control_param.name: nsubOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not nsub summary output files are generated (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: nsubOutVar_names
control_param.desc: Names of sub-basin variables to include in nsub summary output file(s)

control_param.name: nsubOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in nsub summary output file(s)

control_param.name: nsubOut_freq
control_param.desc: Output frequency and type (1=daily; 2=monthly; 3=both; 4=mean monthly; 5=mean yearly; 6=yearly)

control_param.name: basinOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not basin summary output files are generated (0=no; 1=yes)

control_param.name: basinOutVars
control_param.desc: Number of variables to include in basin summary output file(s)

control_param.name: basinOutVar_names
control_param.desc: Names of variables to include in basin summary output file(s)

control_param.name: basinOut_freq
control_param.desc: Output frequency and type (1=daily; 2=monthly; 3=both; 4=mean monthly; 5=mean yearly; 6=yearly)

control_param.name: nsegmentOutON_OFF
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: nsegmentOutVars
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: segmentOutVar_names
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: nsegmentOut_freq
control_param.desc: empty

control_param.name: ndispGraphs
control_param.desc: Number of plots included in the runtime graph

control_param.name: dispGraphsBuffSize
control_param.desc: Number of time steps to wait before updating the runtime graph

control_param.name: csvON_OFF
control_param.desc: Switch to specify whether or not common-separated values (CSV) summary output files are generated (0=no; 1=yes)
